Package dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.utility.fawe

Class BlockEditor

java.lang.Object
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.utility.fawe.BlockEditor
public class BlockEditor extends Object
Utility class for manipulating blocks in WorldEdit regions. This class provides functionality to replace blocks and undo modifications.

    • replaceBlocksInRegion

      public static void replaceBlocksInRegion(@NotNull @NotNull com.sk89q.worldedit.regions.Region region, @NotNull @NotNull com.sk89q.worldedit.function.pattern.Pattern replacingPattern, @NotNull @NotNull Collection<com.sk89q.worldedit.world.block.BlockType> blockTypesToReplace, boolean isMaskInverted)
      Replaces blocks in a specified region using a pattern.
      Parameters:
      region - The region where blocks should be replaced
      replacingPattern - The pattern to replace blocks with
      blockTypesToReplace - Collection of block types to be replaced
      isMaskInverted - If true, replaces blocks that don't match the mask

    • replaceBlocksInRegion

      public static void replaceBlocksInRegion(com.sk89q.worldedit.regions.Region region, org.bukkit.Material blockId, Collection<com.sk89q.worldedit.world.block.BlockType> blockTypesToReplace, boolean isMaskInverted)
      Replaces blocks in a specified region using a Bukkit Material.
      Parameters:
      region - The region where blocks should be replaced
      blockId - The Bukkit Material to replace blocks with
      blockTypesToReplace - Collection of block types to be replaced
      isMaskInverted - If true, replaces blocks that don't match the mask

    • undoAllBlockModifications

      public static void undoAllBlockModifications()
      Undoes all block modifications stored in the edit history. Creates new sessions for each undo operation and closes them afterward. Clears the edit history after completion.

    • clearActiveEditSessions

      public static void clearActiveEditSessions()
      Closes all active edit sessions and clears the edit history. Should be called during plugin shutdown or when cleanup is needed.
